text: HI.Do you know about Save the Childre organization?
I've heard of them but other then that no not much how about you?
I have.They help children in need
Well, that's a noble cause don't you think
Of course.I have seen kids dying of hunger in those countries at war.It breaks my heart
I can imagine, that is horrible..... to not be able to eat, or drink, and worry about being sick all the time
They are children.They did not ask fot this.
well, I can't imagine anyone would much less a child....
How much money do you spend on candy?
not much maybe a couple dollars every few months
Well that can make a difference in a children life
I donate sometimes well, to other charities
This one ensure that children get the money
That's always good, it's not good to donate somewhere that they don't give to what they're supposed to be donating to
Of course not.Many children in war zones are struggling
Horrible, I know..... war is like adults acting like children but worse because they know they're not showing regard to the people suffering
Are you commit to the cause?
Of course I'll donate something
how much are you willing to donate today?
I'll donate $0.05
